value.name: Letters for May 2: Militarized police departments aren’t the way to solve drug use
value.description: I encourage readers to search the internet for Zachary Hammond to witness the execution of an unarmed white citizen. More police and prisons will never solve the problem of drug abuse ...

value.name: Attorney for family of Seneca teen shot, killed by police calls for grand jury investigation
value.description: Eric Bland, of the Bland Richter law firm based in Columbia and Charleston, was retained by 19-year-old Zachary Hammond’s family following Hammond’s death. “This is a most troubling incident ...
